languages.text: {n}Из-под маски раздается гортанный смешок... или рык, похожий на него.{/n} "Не думаю, что мое ментальное бодрствование продлится достаточно долго, чтобы найти в этом местечке достойный Вашей Светлости рекаф".

{n}A low-pitched chuckle comes from under the mask... or maybe a snarl that sounds like chuckling.{/n} "I do not think my newly found lucidity lasts long enough to let me find recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."
languages.original_text: {n}Из-под маски раздается гортанный смешок... или рык, похожий на него.{/n} "Не думаю, что мое ментальное бодрствование продлится достаточно долго, чтобы найти в этом местечке достойный Вашей Светлости рекаф".

traits.locale_text: {n}A throaty chuckle comes from under the mask... Or maybe a snarl sounding like one.{/n} "I do not think my newfound lucidity lasts long enough to let me find the recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: {n}A throaty chuckle comes from under the mask... Or maybe a snarl sounding like one.{/n} "I do not think my newfound lucidity lasts long enough to let me find the recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}マスクの下から低い笑い声が聞こえる…というより、もしかすると唸り声かもしれない。{/n}「明晰さを新たに得たとは言え、陛下に相応しい模造コーヒーを見つけることができるほど、それが長く続くとは思えない」
languages.original_text: {n}A low-pitched chuckle comes from under the mask... or maybe a snarl that sounds like chuckling.{/n} "I do not think my newly found lucidity lasts long enough to let me find recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスクの下から甲高い笑い声が聞こえる…というより、もしかすると唸り声かもしれない。{/n}「明晰さを新たに得たとは言え、陛下に相応しい模造コーヒーを見つけることができるほど、それが長く続くとは思えない」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}面具下面传来了低沉的笑声……也可能是听起来像笑声的吼声。{/n}“我猜我的神智恐怕没办法清醒那么长时间，恐怕找不到适合您享用的雷卡咖啡，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}A low-pitched chuckle comes from under the mask... or maybe a snarl that sounds like chuckling.{/n} "I do not think my newly found lucidity lasts long enough to let me find recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."

traits.locale_text: {n}面具下面传来了低沉的笑声……也可能是听起来像笑声的吼声。{/n}“我猜我的神智恐怕没办法清醒那么长时间，恐怕找不到适合您享用的雷卡咖啡，大人。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Una risita grave surge de la máscara... O, al menos, un gruñido que suena a risita.{/n} «No creo que mi recién encontrada lucidez dure lo suficiente como para encontrar un café digno de mi{mf|lord|lady} en toda la ciudad».
languages.original_text: {n}A low-pitched chuckle comes from under the mask... or maybe a snarl that sounds like chuckling.{/n} "I do not think my newly found lucidity lasts long enough to let me find recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una risita grave surge de la máscara... O, al menos, un gruñido que suena como tal.{/n} «No creo que mi recién encontrada lucidez dure lo suficiente como para encontrar un café digno de mi{mf|lord|lady} en toda la ciudad».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Ein tiefes Lachen ertönt von unter der Maske ... oder ein Knurren, das nach einem Lachen klingt.{/n} "Ich glaube nicht, dass meine neu gewonnene Klarheit lange genug anhalten wird, damit ich irgendwo den Rekaf finde, der Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} würdig wäre."
languages.original_text: {n}A low-pitched chuckle comes from under the mask... or maybe a snarl that sounds like chuckling.{/n} "I do not think my newly found lucidity lasts long enough to let me find recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein tiefes Lachen ertönt von unter der Maske ... Oder vielleicht ist es ein wütendes Fauchen.{/n} "Ich glaube nicht, dass meine neu gewonnene Klarheit lange genug anhalten wird, damit ich irgendwo den Rekaf finde, der Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} würdig wäre."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Un ricanement grave s'échappe de sous le masque... ou peut-être un grognement qui ressemble à un ricanement.{/n} « Je ne pense pas demeurer lucide assez longtemps pour trouver un recaff digne de Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}A low-pitched chuckle comes from under the mask... or maybe a snarl that sounds like chuckling.{/n} "I do not think my newly found lucidity lasts long enough to let me find recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un ricanement grave vous parvient de sous le masque... Ou peut-être un grognement qui ressemble à un ricanement.{/n} « Je ne pense pas demeurer lucide assez longtemps pour trouver un recaff digne de Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Maskenin altından pes bir tonla bir kıkırtı veya kıkırtıyı andıran bir hırıltı geliyor.{/n} "Yeni eriştiğim bu zihin berraklığının {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne layık bir kahfe bulmama yetecek kadar süreceğini sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}A low-pitched chuckle comes from under the mask... or maybe a snarl that sounds like chuckling.{/n} "I do not think my newly found lucidity lasts long enough to let me find recaf worthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} anywhere."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maskenin altından pes bir tonda bir kıkırtı geliyor. Belki de kıkırtıyı andıran bir hırıltı...{/n} "Yeni eriştiğim bu zihin berraklığının {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerine layık bir kahfe bulmama yetecek kadar süreceğini sanmıyorum."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
